text:
It seems like this one keeps slipping through the cracks so I thought I'd just 
put it in Bugzilla.  A small (3-liner) patch to handle exceptions on 
FileNotFound in the same manner as <property file=""> (continue instead of 
dying).
creator: ben@opennms.org

text:
Created attachment 399
patch to handle FileNotFoundException in Filter.java
creator: ben@opennms.org
umagesh@apache.org
text:
Sidenote:
--------
<property> does not actually catch FileNotFoundException.  It checks to see
if the file exists and if not, it just logs an message and continues.
<property> will actually fail with a FileNotFoundException if the supplied
file is, for example, a directory.

creator: ben@opennms.org
text:
filtering changed considerably shortly after I put in this bug (ie, with 1.4 
because of filtersets and such), so it's probably safe to just close the bug, 
I suppose...
If Benjamin says, it is save to close the bug, then it is save to close the bug ;-)
creator: bodewig@apache.org
